title: Jinx should be nerfed before the LCS and then reverted
body: Very short and very simple. At a 20% play rate and 53% to 54% win rate in diamond and below I think riot should nerf her ass so that lower elo players dont have to make her a permanent ban choice. Just give her the stats back a month or two before LCS so she isnt a dead pick either. In fact can you do that with a lot of champs that are blocking others from climbing. I am getting tired of banning certain champs just because of the elo I am in.

replies.body:
Mord has 53% wr boards lose their minds.

Ahri or an Adc sits at 53%, and no one gives a shit. 

Classic.
I dunno, I see someone complaining about Ahri every time I look at the boards.
